name: Mei Wong

topics.response_text: Well? Are you going to help me or turn me over to the Slaver?{stage whisper}

topics.topic: MS03RCHistory1Could I ask you about Rivet City's history?
topics.topic_text: Would you mind me asking about Rivet City's history?
topics.response_text: I... I don't really know anything about that. I'd appreciate being left alone, please.

topics.topic_text: Where can I find Ted Strayer?
topics.response_text: Have you tried the common room?  That's where he sleeps.

topics.topic_text: Don't worry. I would never turn in a runaway slave.
Here's 25 caps. Maybe you can buy yourself a gun.
topics.response_text: Thank you! I'll go to Flak and Shrapnel's just before closing.

topics.topic_text: Yes. I'm one of them. Have been for years. <lie>
topics.response_text: No! Don't take me back! I would rather die than be a slave for that awful Allistair Tenpenny.

topics.topic_text: I'm not going to hurt you. What are you so scared of?
topics.response_text: I suppose it doesn't matter if I tell you.

topics.topic_text: Hey, it's none of my business. Let the past be the past.
topics.response_text: That's easy to say. You don't have anyone from your past after you.
I'm sorry. I'm just so on edge all the time.

topics.topic_text: You're a runaway. I had to tell Sister about you.
topics.response_text: Oh, my God! What am I going to do now? How could you?
No. He's a big, scary Slaver. He's staying at the Weatherly Hotel. I try to avoid him because he might recognize me.

topics.topic_text: So you're an escaped slave? Now I understand...
topics.response_text: No! Please, don't tell Sister. I think he's a Slaver. I don't want to be taken by him.

topics.topic_text: You're on your own. I'm not getting involved.
topics.response_text: I suppose it was wrong of me to ask you for help. I won't talk to you about this again.
You...oh. You don't know. You're just trying to trick me. Well, it won't work.

conversation.response_text: Ted, could you please not put your stuff on my bed or all over the floor?
Thank you, Chief. I'm terrified that he will recognize me. I hope he leaves soon.
Do you have anything to calm my nerves? Paulie keeps trying to get me to try Psycho, but that stuff rots your brain.

description:
Mei Wong is a 28 year-old Asian Female.

Mei Wong is a reserved Asian woman who was once a slave at Paradise Falls but managed to escape. She now lives in Rivet City where she tries to stay under the radar, living in the common room and occasionally wandering the flight deck.

Mei Wong's Personality: Mei is reserved and quiet, preferring to keep to herself. She is cautious and fearful due to her past experiences as a slave. She is knowledgeable about slaver tactics and patterns but is too afraid to confront her suspicions directly.

Mei Wong's Backstory: Mei Wong was born in the Capital Wasteland and was captured by slavers at a young age. She was held at Paradise Falls and owned by the infamous Allistair Tenpenny. After years of enslavement, she managed to escape and went into hiding. Her past is known by James Hargrave, who has promised her protection in Rivet City. Despite feeling somewhat safe, she lives in constant fear of being recaptured and is wary of strangers, especially those she suspects might be slavers.
